title: Representations - Modeling Situations with Diff Eq

content.question: A rectangle has length <math alttext="x" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>x</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, width <math alttext="y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, and area <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>. The instantaneous rate of change of the area with respect to the width is equal to the sum of the length and twice the width. Which of the following equations describes this relationship?

choices.label: <math alttext="A, equals x plus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of y with respect to x, equals x plus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to x, equals x plus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>x</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to y, equals x plus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to y, equals x plus 2 y" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>y</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi>y</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
